body: This specialist's workshop provides a variety of tools and materials for a particular art form, such as glassworking, gemcutting, or sculpting, which you choose when you build the room. Up to three people can use the room at a time.
name: Artisan's Workshop
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Rooms And Teams/Rooms and Teams/Rooms/Artisans Workshop
benefit: counts as masterwork artisan's tools for one Craft skill
